General.Name: Saudee Group Bhd
General.Description: Saudee Group Berhad, an investment holding company, produces and sells processed poultry, beef products, frozen foods, and bakery products in Malaysia. The company offers burger patties, nuggets, sausages, meatballs, fried chicken, minced meat, bratwursts, frankfurter, and other products primarily under the Saudi Gold and Farm's Gold brand names. It also engages in the wholesale and dealership of fresh and frozen foods. The company was formerly known as Sinaria Corporation Berhad and changed its name to Saudee Group Berhad in December 2013. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sungai Petani, Malaysia.
